title: [AUDIO] - Star Guardian Ahri's Quiet Voicelines.

replies.body:
Hey TheyCallMeJinx,

Thanks so much for taking the time to give this feedback. I've heard this from a couple folks, and I agree it would be a shame if we aren't able to experience Ahri's VO in all its sassy glory. I will look into getting this fixed up!
Thank you very much! I'll be keeping my eye (ears?) out for it!

hello, my freind also just bought me the star guardian Ahri skin, and I've notice she doesn't mentions her first blood repose or any taunt responses for that matter.  It would really suck not getting all of that paid for sass
